Name: a survivor girl
About the game: The Girl Who crashed into exoplanet is going to be chased by various extraterrestrial life on that planet. Will the girl would be able to escape the exoplanet safely? This game is a survival PRG game, Every night, somewhere on the planet, extraterrestrial life will attack you suddenly. You should grow fast to confront those alien creatures that become more violent as time goes on. Defeat the final boss called Drackmahre and escape from the planet as soon as possible. Killing those alien creatures make you have experience points and gold. In addition, you can also acquire skills through the level-up. So, you can make items and enhance them with Gold accordingly. Please survive with the good combination of different skills and items until you escape from this planet.
